咶字的基本解释

咶
huài
喘息，气息。

咶
shì
古同“舐”，舔。

咶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《洪武正韻》善指切，上紙］
舔；食。
[②]［huài］
［《廣韻》火怪切，去怪，曉。］
［《廣韻》火夬切，去夬，曉。］
［《廣韻》下刮切，入鎋，匣。］
喘息。
[③]［guō］
同“聒1”。
声音嘈杂，吵闹。参见“咶3耳”、“咶3絮”。
[④]［guā］
象声词。参见“咶4喇”、“咶4噠”。

咶字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　咶； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页187第14
【廣韻】火怪切【集韻】火夬切，?音䵳。【廣韻】鼻息。【博雅】息也。　又【廣韻】下刮切，音頢。義同。【集韻】或作?。　又【集韻】胡化切，音㕦。與話同。言也。　又【正韻】善指切，音視。與䑛同。【管子·地數篇】十口之家，十人咶鹽。【莊子·人間世】咶其葉，則口爛而爲傷。【荀子·疆國篇】是猶伏而咶天。【後漢·皇后記】湯夢及天而咶之。

咶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
咶字的起名意思

暂无。

Huh
huài
Gasp, breath.
Huh
shì
Gu Tong "licked" and licked.
Huh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" is good at finger cutting, on paper]
Lick; eat.
[②]［huài］
["Guangyun" fire monsters cut, go to blame, Xiao. ]
["Guang Yun" Huo Chuan cut, go to Chu, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" scrape and cut, enter the pouch, box. ]
respite.
[③] [guō]
Same as "聒1".
The sound is noisy and noisy. See "咶3 ears", "咶3 Xu".
[④] [guā]
Onomatopoeia. See "咶4 la", "咶4 da".

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　咶; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 187 14
[Guang Yun] Fire Monster Cut [Ji Yun] Fire 夬切,? Yin 䵳. [Guang Yun] Sniff. [Bo Ya] Rest also.　[Guang Yun] Scrape and cut, the sound is sharp. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Jiyun] Hu Huaqie, sound 㕦. Same with words. Words also.　[Zheng Yun] is good at finger-cutting, audio-visual. Same as Tong. 【Guanzi·Dishu Articles】a family of ten, ten people eat salt. [Zhuangzi·Human World] If you stun its leaves, your mouth will be rotten and hurt.
